ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisAppointment of LILI-ANNA PEREŠA of Montréal, Quebec, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of six months.
